item.title: Comment on Request: Alex King Rememberances by Shanti Rao
item.dc:creator: Shanti Rao
item.description: You must have been the only Messenger editor who _didn't_ cause a production delay, need your ego stroked, or otherwise induce drama. This'll take a few days.
item.content:encoded: You must have been the only Messenger editor who _didn’t_ cause a production delay, need your ego stroked, or otherwise induce drama. This’ll take a few days.

item.title: Comment on Request: Alex King Rememberances by Alex King
item.dc:creator: Alex King

item.title: Comment on Request: Alex King Rememberances by Peter Chester
item.dc:creator: Peter Chester
item.description: Alex, this is a beautiful and disarming thing you are doing. I look forward to taking an afternoon and replying thoughtfully. I understand your daughters position in this well. It's heart breaking. What are we really if not a narrative? You are your stories. I am honored to be a guardian of your tale.
item.content:encoded: Alex, this is a beautiful and disarming thing you are doing. I look forward to taking an afternoon and replying thoughtfully. I understand your daughters position in this well. It’s heart breaking. What are we really if not a narrative? You are your stories. I am honored to be a guardian of your tale.

item.title: Comment on Request: Alex King Rememberances by Aimee Black

item.description: What about high school memories? I understand that's a whole other conversation w your daughter.. ? kidding..
item.content:encoded: What about high school memories? I understand that’s a whole other conversation w your daughter.. ? kidding..

item.title: Comment on Request: Alex King Rememberances by Alex King
item.dc:creator: Alex King

item.title: Comment on Request: Alex King Rememberances by Andrea Marie
item.dc:creator: Andrea Marie
item.description: Alex King I have very great memories of playing volleyball with you back in the day! You were one of my favorite people to play with (and sometimes against). You always kept a positive attitude and we won a lot of our games because of your awesome competitive nature. Believe it or not, but my volleyball skills improved by playing with you. Stay strong!
item.content:encoded: Alex King I have very great memories of playing volleyball with you back in the day! You were one of my favorite people to play with (and sometimes against). You always kept a positive attitude and we won a lot of our games because of your awesome competitive nature. Believe it or not, but my volleyball skills improved by playing with you. Stay strong!

item.description: Sent... hardest email I have written in a long time. You are an inspiration Alex.
item.content:encoded:
Sent… hardest email I have written in a long time.
You are an inspiration Alex.
